Description: M1 Epic: CI, contracts, security baseline, tenancy protections, observability.

Description: M1 Epic: production-grade usability and performance.

No raw color leakage; all semantic tokens enforced.
Provide contrast-safe theme and toggle.
Responsive type scale and hierarchy consistency.
Standardized state components across all data views.
Collect vitals and gate regressions with thresholds.
Responsive image transforms and placeholders.
Cache selected list endpoints with invalidation strategy.
